summary: Website project for an email marketer/copywriter offering email writing services to multiple businesses.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website (landing-style) for an email marketer/copywriter offering email writing services to business clients, with clear positioning, service overview, and strong calls-to-action.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a professional copywriter service brand; avoid default-looking styling and keep the design consistent across all sections/pages.

Implement site navigation and basic content pages/sections for: Services, About, and Contact (either as separate routes or anchored sections), including a persistent header nav and footer with essential links.
Add a contact form for prospective clients to submit inquiries (name, email, company/website optional, message, and service interest), with client-side validation and a success/error state.
Add a simple admin inbox page in the frontend to view and manage submitted inquiries, protected by Internet Identity login and an allowlist/owner check enforced by the backend.

Ensure all user-facing text is in English and includes clear service-focused copy (headline, service descriptions, process steps, and contact prompts) appropriate for selling email writing services to businesses.
Add basic SEO and share metadata for the marketing site (page title, description, and Open Graph/Twitter metadata) consistent with the email marketing/copywriting service offering.
Render generated brand images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the site (e.g., header/hero).

Replace the current site logo image with the user-uploaded image across the site (header and footer), using a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and updating all logo references to the new filename.

Add a visible Twitter/X social link to the site that points to https://x.com/QuillworksMedia (e.g., in the header and/or footer), opening in a new tab with proper rel attributes and an accessible label.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a marketing website promoting the user's email marketing & copywriting (email writing) services for business clients.
Create backend storage and APIs for contact inquiries, including: create inquiry (anonymous allowed), list inquiries (admin-only), and delete inquiry (admin-only).
Update the site logo to use the user-provided image asset (replace existing wordmark/logo).
Add social link(s) to the site (at least Twitter/X: https://x.com/QuillworksMedia), e.g., in header/footer.

projectName: Marketing website for email marketer/copywriter with contact capture and simple admin inbox
